thread.title: Retail Feed, Tire, Garden Supply & Services
thread.title_full: Retail Feed, Tire, Garden Supply & Services

title: Retail Feed, Tire, Garden Supply & Services
text: Questions Business Summary This farm supply shop holds the market in its little county in many ways. They are a highly reliable source of a variety of quality feeds as well as the largest supplier of tire services in town. Tire sales and installation services are offered year round to the region. Another service that makes this company unique is that they are the only agricultural business in the county to do service calls out in the field. In spring and throughout the growing season the retail store also offers gardening supplies such as young plants, tools, fertilizers, weed and pest killers, planters and pottery. All in all, this establishment is a one-stop shop for many in this Texas County. Owner operated for over 35 years, this business can be run in a hands-on or absentee fashion. The current owner took over management in 2000. A new owner will find advantages like a great location, a high demand for services, and a well established reputation and clientele. Retail of quality feed products brings in 30% of all revenues for this company while Tire sales and services makes up 26% of profits. The sale of gardening supply products such as fertilizers and miscellaneous gardening products brings in 18% of revenues while the remaining 21% is from tire services in-house or in the field. The current owner is selling in hopes of having more time for family and hopes to find someone interested in this kind of business to take over. Please contact our offices today for more details! This 11,250 sq ft building was built in 1965 and has been housing the business since its beginning. It is in fair condition with new additions and remodeling. It lies adjacent to the town's city hall, and offers room for expansion. Included in the facilities are shop, storage, work and office areas. The business can be relocated to any location if a new owner should desire. Though included in the sale, the property could be separated if desired. Asking $2 For Everything. 25% Financing! Financials
